item.title: Overwatch 2: New Tank Hero Revealed
item.description: Blizzard unveils new tank hero ‘Maverick’ with unique mobility and defensive abilities.

item.title: Overwatch 2: Hero 42 'Nexus' Breaks the Meta
item.description: Blizzard introduces Nexus, a reality-bending support hero that changes how teams approach team composition.
